data.eml:eml: Re-characterization of Gymelloxes with a re-description of Gymelloxes terea from Central America (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Grehan, John R., Mielke, Carlos G. C. (2017): Re-characterization of Gymelloxes with a re-description of Gymelloxes terea from Central America (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae). Zootaxa 4363 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.3.8
